title: The News with Rick Sanchez - October 28, 2019 (20:00 ET)
text:
Sudden economic rage in the Americas, US to blame (Full show)

Rick Sanchez reports on political tumult in Latin America, where a left-wing populist Alberto Fernández was elected president of Argentina. Then RT Producer Enrique Rivera joins the discussion. Foreign Minister of Ecuador Ricardo Patiño weighs in on Washington’s continuing interventionism in the region and how it has evolved. He argues that the US developed “lawfare” in Latin American countries to go after progressive leaders. Residents are frantically evacuating in the wake of wildfires in northern California.

RT America's Natasha Sweatte reports live from the scene. Professor of economics and author Richard Wolff joins Rick Sanchez to discuss the Hong Kong protests, arguing that "Hong Kong needs China more than China needs Hong Kong." Then RT America's Michele Greenstein shares her insights on the protests. Plus, RT’s Eisa Ali reports on Brexit’s extended headline.
